mapper.select:
select sdb.id, sdb.school_id, sdb.discipline_id, sdb.index_no, ss.name as schoolName, ss.city, ss.province, ss.manage, ss.`level`, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment from school_discipline_bind sdb left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = sdb.school_id) left join discipline_info di on (di.id = sdb.discipline_id) where 1 = 1
AND ss.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schoolDisciplineBind.schoolName},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schoolDisciplineBind.disciplineName},'%')
AND di.employment LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schoolDisciplineBind.employment},'%')
AND ss.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schoolDisciplineBind.schoolId},'%')
order by sdb.school_id, sdb.index_no desc

select sdb.id, sdb.school_id, sdb.discipline_id, sdb.index_no, ss.name as schoolName, ss.area, ss.manage, ss.`level`, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment from school_discipline_bind sdb left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = sdb.school_id) left join discipline_info di on (di.id = sdb.discipline_id) where 1 = 1 AND di.school_id = #{schoolId} order by sdb.school_id, sdb.index_no desc
